title: Project-Based Learning Curriculum on Ecosystem Balance in Large-Scale Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of fundamental life sciences and environmental science
context.additional_context: An in-house corporate education program for professionals to strengthen scientific literacy, conducted in digitally enabled environments.

learning_goals: Learners can construct models that explain interactions among ecosystem components (plants, soil, topography).
Through project-based learning activities, learners can analyze and present the scientific principles of ecosystem balance.
Learners can propose ecosystem conservation strategies using diorama models collaboratively developed through teamwork.
Learners can apply scientific inquiry skills (observation, classification, reasoning) through formative assessment activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
